text: Tritia erythraea is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks.Marshall, B. (2016). Tritia erythraea (Issel, 1869). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=876828 on 2016-05-18 ==Description== The shell size varies between 4.5 mm and 9 mm ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Red Sea and in the Indian Ocean off Madagascar ==References== * Dautzenberg, Ph. (1929). Mollusques testacés marins de Madagascar. Faune des Colonies Francaises, Tome III ==External links== * erythraea Category:Gastropods described in 1869
title: Tritia erythraea
